tag_list: digital, content, social-media, strategy, branded-content, marketing, seo, magazine, publishing
overview:
James Fletcher, or Fletch as he is known, is the head of digital for Harris Publications’ 70 titles. He develops and manages digital, mobile and social media strategies across all brands including XXL, Rides, SLAM, Elektro and Juicy.

Prior to Harris Publications, Fletch spent 10 years at AOL working on content, marketing, product and monetization for some of the company’s biggest initiatives: City’s Best, Digital City, AOL Vegas, The Biz, TMZ, Live 8, AOL Small Business, AOL Brand, Patch, Asylum, Black Voices, AOL Coaches, AOL Comedy.

Fletch also served as an AOL company spokesperson with appearances at conferences and in TV, radio and print.
